readme:
# @moefy-canvas/theme-popper

:tada: 点击鼠标试试～ ## Install ```bash pnpm add @moefy-canvas/theme-popper ``` ## Usage ```html ``` ```ts import { Popper, PopperShape, PopperConfig, MAX_Z_INDEX, CanvasOptions, } from '@moefy-canvas/theme-popper' const themeConfig: PopperConfig = { shape: PopperShape.Star, size: 1.75, numParticles: 10, } const canvasOptions: CanvasOptions = { opacity: 1, zIndex: MAX_Z_INDEX, } const el = document.getElementById('moefy-canvas') const popper = new Popper(themeConfig, canvasOptions) popper.mount(el as HTMLCanvasElement) ``` ## ThemeConfig ```ts export enum PopperShape { Star = 'star', Circle = 'circle', } export interface PopperConfig extends ThemeConfig { shape?: PopperShape size?: number numParticles?: number } ```
